    • Uses of CoverageSet in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.h

      Methods in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.decoder.h with parameters of type CoverageSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double IsolatedPhraseForeignCoverageHeuristic.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> newHypothesis, CoverageSet newCoverage) 
      double DTUIsolatedPhraseForeignCoverageHeuristic.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> hyp, CoverageSet newCoverage)
      For a given coverage set C of a given hypothesis, this finds all the gaps in the coverage set (e.g., if C = {1,5,10}, then gaps are 2-4 and 6-9), and sums the future costs associated with all gaps (e.g., future-cost(2-4) + future-cost(6-9)).
      double SearchHeuristic.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> newHypothesis, CoverageSet newCoverage) 
      double NullHeuristic.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> newHypothesis, CoverageSet newCoverage) 
      double OptimisticForeignCoverageHeuristic.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> newHypothesis, CoverageSet newCoverage) 
      double DTUIsolatedPhraseForeignCoverageHeuristicAlt.getHeuristicDelta(Hypothesis<TK,FV> hyp, CoverageSet newCoverage)
      For a given coverage set C of a given hypothesis, this finds all contiguous segments in the coverage set (e.g., if C = {1,5,6,10}, then segments are {5-6} and {10}), and computes future cost as follows: fcost(C) = fcost(1-10) - fcost(5-6) - fcost(10).
